name: Hand of War (Game Jam Edition)
description:
Hand of War is a Local Multiplayer 2D Turn-based Medieval Strategy Game set in a Medieval Fantasy setting. You move your units on a tile-based board attacking your opponent's units. Your goal is to eliminate your opponent's King and win the war for your faction.

In Hand of War, the outcome of a battle between two units is determined by drawing a playing card from a standard 52 card deck. If your card's face value is higher than your opponent's, then their unit takes damage. If your card's face value is lower, then your unit takes the damage.
